name: Kubblammo
description:
Kubblammo is an action packed 2 player game, based on Kubb, the ancient game of the Vikings. Enjoy this modern twist on the traditional game - delve into its awesome worlds, and enjoy the music!

Players take turns throwing a baton to knock down their opponents kubbs (logs), before taking aim at the king!

This is a family friendly game that is easy to pick up, but hard to master. Take on your friends and family in fun, over the top mythology themed worlds.

Still in early stages, so hold on for more characters, levels and game modes (including 1 player puzzle mode) soon!

Art and music created by Close Encounters Music.
